横須賀鎮守府/呉鎮守府沖: Yokosuka Naval Base / Off Kure Naval Base
欧州方面の反攻上陸作戦参加\nの前に内地及び周辺海上輸送\n航路の脅威を排除する: Before engaging in counter-offensive landing operations in the European area, eliminate threats along the domestic and surrounding maritime shipping lanes! Launch the fleet! Secure control of the sea!
南沙諸島沖/カムラン湾沖: Off the Spratly Islands / Off Cam Ranh Bay
昭南本土航路及び同周辺南沙\n諸島海域制海権を確保せよ！\nカムラン湾沖に出没す: Secure control of the Shonan mainland shipping lanes and the surrounding Nansha Islands waters! Locate and destroy the trade-destroying forces appearing off Cam Ranh Bay!
三陸沖に接近中の敵機動部隊\nを遊撃する！八戸付近の防御\nを固め、連合艦隊主力: Engage the approaching enemy task force off Sanriku! Strengthen the defenses near Hachinohe and with the main force of the Combined Fleet, destroy the enemy task force!
北海道千島方面の海上輸送を\n確かなものにするため、第五\n艦隊、そして一水戦や: In order to ensure safe deliveries to the Kuril Islands of Hokkaido, the 5th Fleet, the 1st Torpedo Squadron and other fleets must combine their forces and destroy the enemy!
付近に敵機動部隊出現の兆候を認む。\n対空警戒を厳に！:
We have detected signs of enemy task forces
in the vicinity. Maintain anti-aircraft alert!
艦隊は呉に入港、さらに徳山燃料廠へ。\n対空警戒は怠るな！:
Our fleet is in port at Kure, and then on to
Tokuyama Fuel Depot. Do not let up on
     anti-aircraft alert!
これより津軽海峡へ進入、太平洋側に出る。\n艦隊、対空警戒を厳に！:
We will now enter the Tsugaru Strait and
exit on the Pacific side.
     Fleet, keep strict anti-aircraft alert!
第五艦隊、前進ッ！\n八戸沖の敵艦隊を撃滅する。続け！:
5th Fleet, advance! Destroy the enemy fleet
off Hachinohe. Keep going!
艦隊はこれより八戸港に入港する。\n入港用意！:
Our fleet will now enter
the port of Hachinohe. Get ready to dock!
北東方面艦隊主力、第五艦隊、見参！\n敵を捜索撃滅する！ 前進ッ！:
The main northeastern fleet, the 5th Fleet,
is here! We will search
     and destroy the enemy! Forward!
